articles.author: Thinus Ferreira
articles.title: TV in a time of tragedy - When a series has to move forward amid the death of a star - News24
articles.description: The unexpected deaths of SA's Eric Nobbs and American actor Leslie Jordan brought shock and grief – but also production chaos behind the scenes.
articles.content:
• South African actor Eric Nobbs and American actor Leslie Jordan died this week while filming new seasons of TV shows.
  • Filming has been temporarily halted on both productions.
  • … [+2958 chars]

articles.title: American singer Kelis shares video showing 2 women in Singapore touching her hair without permission - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Milkshake singer was sitting at a coffee shop when two women standing behind her started touching her braids and exclaiming about its length and whether it was real.
articles.content: It appeared that Kelis was initially trying to approach the interaction with good humour, even turning around to touch one of the womens hair in response, but the singer mostly looked bemused and res… [+1582 chars]
